title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year

Inflation rate compared to previous year is gradually decreasing from 1984 to 1987, roughly constant from 1987 to 1989, rapidly increasing from 1989 to 1990, gradually decreasing from 1990 to 1992, rapidly increasing from 1992 to 1993, gradually decreasing from 1993 to 1994, rapidly increasing from 1994 to 1995, rapidly decreasing from 1995 to 1996, roughly constant from 1996 to 1997, rapidly decreasing from 1997 to 1999, rapidly increasing from 1999 to 2000, gradually decreasing from 2000 to 2001, rapidly increasing from 2001 to 2002, rapidly decreasing from 2002 to 2003, rapidly increasing from 2003 to 2004, rapidly decreasing from 2004 to 2006, rapidly increasing from 2006 to 2008, rapidly decreasing from 2008 to 2012, rapidly increasing from 2012 to 2013, gradually decreasing from 2013 to 2014, rapidly increasing from 2014 to 2016, rapidly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, gradually decreasing from 2018 to 2019, rapidly increasing from 2019 to 2021, and lastly roughly constant from 2021 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1995 and 1996.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 5.97 was recorded at Year 1995
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.01 was recorded at Year 1999
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1995 to 2003.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2014.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1984 to 1990.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2019 to 2024.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014 to 2019.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2003 to 2008.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 1990 to 1995.
